root.name: Get Dexter
root.description: PlotIn 2912, the war on Earth is not going well. If the Central Galactic Control Computer is lost, it will be the end. The Council Of Sages sends android expert Dexter and his podocephalus Scooter to retrieve the computers memory and save mankind.GameplayThe game is played through a series of isometric rooms. Dexter can move and interact with a huge amount of objects in the game, and can use Scooter to investigate difficult to reach areas.TriviaWas originally called 'Crafton et Xunk' when it was first released in France.
